      • addGrade

        public boolean addGrade(java.lang.String idStudent,
               java.lang.String idCourse,
               java.util.Calendar date,
               double mark)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a new grade. Course and Student must already exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        idStudent - the id of the Student that is graded
        idCourse - the id of the course
        date - the date of the grade
        mark - the mark of the grade
        Returns:
        true if success, false for failure
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • addProfessor

        public void addProfessor(java.lang.String SSID,
                java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.String phone,
                int departamentId)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds new Professor in the system. The name of the department will be loaded in the system only after synchronization with the database is performed.
        Parameters:
        SSID - professor's SSID
        firstName - professor's first Name
        lastName - professor's last Name
        email - professor's email
        phone - professor's phone
        departamentId - professor's department id number
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
